channel.title: Titan614 || Eco/Spawn || Hybridding || Autocasting || Perfect Combat || 24/7
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i46.tinypic.com/20qdn3k.png%20[/img]
[b][img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img] [url=http://www.titan614.com][b]Forums[/b] [/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/imijbl.png[/img] [url=http://www.titan614.com/play] [b]Play Now[/b][/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qgacD.png[/img] [url=http://www.titan614.com/vote][b]Voting Page[/b][/url]
[img]http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/7108/2063ba990805457595d9d47.png[/img][url=http://www.titan614.com/index.php?topic=14193.0][b][color=navy] [size=18pt]Click here to see the images[/size][/color][/b][/url]
[b][color=blue]Brief Introduction:[/color][/b]
Our primary goal for Titan 614 is to ensure that the game-play for Titan 614 resembles accurately as possible to RuneScape's game-play. At this point we're currently in a beta stage therefore you may experience some bugs or even flaws, but bare with us we're working on fixing them as we speak!
[b]Combat:[/b]
- Perfect maxhit formulas (All max hits are perfected for every weapon including ranged bows) - Most weapons working (All weapons work properly and accurately except special attacks, we're currently developing them) - Double vengeance has been patched (After you've already casted vengeance, you must now wait 30 seconds) - Poisoning (Anti-poisons work too) - Mage stacking with melee has been patched - Korasi formula perfect! - Autocasting - Perfect switching
[b]Server:[/b]
- Dedicated owner & staff [Currently looking for moderators] - Weekly updates - Fully DDos Protection - Protected Site - Friendly players - Active community - Active Pking & clans
[b]Other Features:[/b]
- Friends List working completely (on, off, private) - Perfect working shops system (buying and selling items) - Clan Chats - HD Graphics - No Lagging - 24/7 Hosted Dedi - Donatorzone and shops - Mac/Windows compatible - Dicing - Pk shops - Voteshop
[shadow=red,left][size=14pt][b]Extra Pictures:[/b][/size][/shadow]
[b]Working spirit shields:[/b] [img]http://i1062.photobucket.com/albums/t488/Test_Person/spiritshields.png[/img]
[b]Donator shop:[/b] [img]http://img560.imageshack.us/img560/5847/15f36a430c4840ed97579a4.png[/img]
[b]Vote-shop:[/b] [img]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/5457/a1248b599d35447a8d1e66a.png[/img]
Pk-shop: [img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/2513/2edf7a1df40e42859d3ce55.png[/img]
Bridding clan fights: [img]http://i1062.photobucket.com/albums/t488/Test_Person/01.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Titan614 || Eco/Spawn || Hybridding || Autocasting || Perfect Combat || 24/7

item.description:
@Titan614 wrote:

[center]

[b] Forums
 Play Now
Voting Page

[color=navy] [size=18pt]Click here to see the images[/size][/color]

[color=blue]Brief Introduction:[/color]

Our primary goal for Titan 614 is to ensure that the game-play for Titan 614 resembles accurately as possible to RuneScape’s game-play.
At this point we’re currently in a beta stage therefore you may experience some bugs or even flaws,
but bare with us we’re working on fixing them as we speak!

Combat:

  • Perfect maxhit formulas (All max hits are perfected for every weapon including ranged bows)
  • Most weapons working (All weapons work properly and accurately except special attacks, we’re currently developing them)
  • Double vengeance has been patched (After you’ve already casted vengeance, you must now wait 30 seconds)
  • Poisoning (Anti-poisons work too)
  • Mage stacking with melee has been patched
  • Korasi formula perfect!
  • Autocasting
  • Perfect switching

Server:

  • Dedicated owner & staff [Currently looking for moderators]
  • Weekly updates
  • Fully DDos Protection
  • Protected Site
  • Friendly players
  • Active community
  • Active Pking & clans

Other Features:

  • Friends List working completely (on, off, private)
  • Perfect working shops system (buying and selling items)
  • Clan Chats
  • HD Graphics
  • No Lagging
  • 24/7 Hosted Dedi
  • Donatorzone and shops
  • Mac/Windows compatible
  • Dicing
  • Pk shops
  • Voteshop

[shadow=red,left][size=14pt]Extra Pictures:[/size][/shadow]

Working spirit shields:

Donator shop:

Vote-shop:
